sections.heading: Number; genderUnless the context clearly indicates otherwise:(1) Words used in the singular number apply also to the plural; words used in the plural number include the singular; and(2) Words used in one gender apply also to the others
sections.text: Number; genderUnless the context clearly indicates otherwise:(1) Words used in the singular number apply also to the plural; words used in the plural number include the singular; and(2) Words used in one gender apply also to the others.
